Muhayo is a 36-year-old woman from the Shahrinav region. She is married and is the mother of two children. Muhayo lives in the region with her family. She is a serious woman. Muhayo offers dressmaker services from her home. She has been working at this business for 3 years. Muhayo chose this work because her sister had done this type of work before. She likes doing sewing work because she receives a daily income and can talk to new clients.

Muhayo has decided to expand her business and attract new clients. She wants to buy a new sewing machine with a loan. With these plans, she has applied for a loan. Her dream is to someday open her own tailor shop where she would sew traditional women's clothing.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Neria

texts.en:
Neria is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 63 years old and has two children who are in school.

Neria has a nipa-making business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy nipa leaves, bamboo sticks, etc.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Neria has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy nipa leaves, bamboo sticks, etc.

loans.name: Feruza

texts.ru: Феруза 30 летняя добрая, общительная и гостеприимная девушка из города Турсунзаде. Народ Турсунзаде славится своим не сравнительным стилем гостеприимства и чувство юмора. Феруза замужем и имеет двух сыночек. Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации по причине, что он не нашел себе подходящую работу в стране. Феруза дома занимается шитьем женской национальной одежды. Она старается помочь мужу обеспечить семью. Феруза хочет создать хорошие условия работы. За счет заемных денег она намерена, приобрети новую швейную машинку для ускорения процесс соей работы. Она верит, что ей не откажут в кредите и заранее выражает благодарность.
texts.en:
Feruza is a kind, responsible, and hospitable 30-year-old woman from the city of Tursun-zoda. People from Tursun-zoda are famous for their incomparable style of hospitality and sense of humor. Feruza is married and has two sons. Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation, because he could not find suitable work in the country.

Feruza works at home sewing traditional women's clothing. She tries to help her husband provide for their family. Feruza wants to create good work conditions. She intends to use borrowed money to get a new sewing machine to speed up her work. She believes that she will not be denied a loan, and expresses gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and speed up her sewing work.

loans.name: Roberta

texts.en:
Roberta is a 32-year-old woman who lives in the town of Carles, Iloilo. She is married and a mother of seven teenage and young children. Her oldest child is 17 years old while her youngest child is two years old. Her husband works hard as a fisherman while she helps her husband do this business to earn a living. They have been doing this for more than four years. They work together to provide and sustained every day.

Roberta dreams in the future to have better means of living and to give good education to her children. Thus, she is asking a loan for boat maintenance and to buy fishing nets and fishing rods to improve their catch.

loans.use: for boat maintenance and to buy fishing nets and fishing rods.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Mary Ann works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Mary Ann is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle for her motorcycle transport business.

Mary Ann has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric is a married man aged 42 living in Hoima-Uganda. He operates a retail shop mostly selling of cooking oil, salt, soap, general merchandise among other items. In order to supplement his income, in 1999, he ventured into farming of beans and maize, so as to raise more income for his family and to have more food security in his village and areas surrounding him.

His dream is to develop and expand his business so as to improve the standards of living of his family. He is seeking for a facility to buy more soap and salt for sell.

loans.use: to buy more soap and salt for sell.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигора 28 летняя молодая и красивая девушка жительница района Шахринав. Она еще не замужем и не имеет детей. Нигора живет вместе папой и мамой. Отец работает мастером по ремонту домов. Мама домохозяйка она ведет домашнее хозяйство. Нигора 5 лет занята швейной деле. Она занимается шитьем женской одежды. Нигора самостоятельная девушка, она зарабатывает и помогает отцу обеспечить семью. В швейном деле ей нравится сшить национальную женскую одежду. Нигора решила купить новую многофункциональную швейную машинку, чтобы расширить деятельность и улучшить свою деятельность. Но так как на эту цель у нее нет достаточных финансовых средств, она решилась обратиться за кредитом.
texts.en:
Nigora is a young and beautiful 28-year-old woman who lives in the Shahrinav region. She is not yet married and does not have children. Nigora lives with her mother and father. Nigora's father works as a handyman who repairs houses. Her mother is a housewife who runs the household.

Nigora has done sewing work for 5 years. She sews women's clothing. Nigora is an independent young woman, and she works and helps her father provide for the family.

Nigora has decided to buy a new multifunction sewing machine so that she can expand and improve her business. However, as she does not have enough funds for this goal, she has decided to apply for a loan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Edgardo Jr

texts.en:
Edgardo Jr. is 18 years old from Valle Cruz, Cabanatuan, Nueva Ecija. Their family is struggling financially which makes it hard for them to send him to college.

Because of that, Edgardo wants to seek financial help from the Kiva lenders by taking an education loan of PHP43,000 which he will use in studying a 9-month Microfinance Technology course. He wants to finish his studies to help his family and to give back to his parents.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fee in a Microfinance Technology course.

loans.name: Grupo Solidario Jesucristo Group

texts.es: Grupo Solidario Jesucristo La encargada de este grupo es la señora Juliana de 51 años de edad, es viuda y tiene dos hijas mayores de edad muy trabajadoras quienes la apoyan en todo.  Ella es vendedora de productos por catalogo en general de  diferentes empresas, es vendedora ambulante desde hace 30 años y le da muchas gracias a Dios porque ya es distribuidora por mayor en muchos lugares, su sueño es seguir creciendo y tener una tienda donde ella solo distribuya los productos y no caminar mucho.  Ella tiene a otras 5 señoras que le ayudan a vender  y últimamente tiene pedidos fuertes de productos.  El dinero que tiene no le alcanza y para aprovechar precios y ofertas ella siempre compra en efectivo en las tiendas.  Por tal motivo ella necesita un préstamo para comprar lo que le hace falta y así no quedarle mal a sus compradoras y vendedoras.  Les da muchas gracias a ustedes por las oportunidades que les brindan a pesar de las distancias.  Les desea bendiciones.
texts.en:
Juliana is a member of Grupo Solidario Jesucristo, is 51 years old, is a widow, and has two daughters who are older and very hard working, supporting her in everything. She sells general catalog products from different companies.

Having been a traveling saleswoman for 30 years, Juliana gives many thanks to God because, now, she is a wholesale distributor in many places. Her dream is to continue growing and to have a store where she only acts as distributor, and doesn't have to walk much.

Juliana has another 5 women who help her conduct sales, and she already has strong offers for products. The money she has isn't enough, and to take advantage of prices and offers she always buys in cash in the stores. For this reason, she needs a loan to purchase what she's missing so she doesn't disappoint her buyers and sellers. She thanks all of you for the opportunities you bring, despite the distance, and sends her blessings.

loans.use: to purchase catalog products for resale.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Theresa is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional groceries to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like raising livestock and tricycle passenger businesses.

Ma. Theresa dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough money to expand her business

loans.use: to buy additional wheels and spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Sara María

texts.es: Sara es una emprendedora mujer que palpó su oportunidad de negocio, cuando los clientes de sus cónyuge un tendero de barrio, le solicitaban suero un producto elaborado a base de la leche de la vaca que es sometida a una fermentación controlada y después de otra serie de procesos se obtiene un producto muy apetecido por los pobladores del municipio de Arjona en el departamento de Bolívar,  por ser un producto que acompaña muy bien las comidas típicas de esta zona entre ellas  el bollo, la yuca e incluso el arroz.  Sara consiguió unos contactos que le enseñaron el proceso productivo y empezó una distribución masiva en tiendas del municipio, alterno a esta actividad también  elabora y comercializa deditos y tortas.   Sara es una mujer con una habilidad para los negocios fenomenal y en la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo que invertirá en un nuevo proyecto de negocio prendas de plata que pretende vender en el municipio del Guamo en donde tiene una potencial clientela.  Esta inversión le permitirá seguir ofreciendo bienestar a su familia puesto que es madre de tres hijas todas menores de edad.  Su meta a futuro es tener una miscelánea y una heladería.
texts.en:
Sara is an enterprising woman who sensed a business opportunity when the customers of her spouse, a shopkeeper, asked for whey. This is a product made of cow milk that is submitted to a controlled fermentation and other series of processes to obtain a product desired by the residents of the Arjona municipality, department of Bolivar. It is a product that goes well with the traditional meals of this area, such as "bollo" (corn dough wrapped in corn husks), cassava and even with rice.

Sara found some people who taught her how to produce it and she started a massive distribution to stores in the municipality. In addition, she also makes and sells "deditos" (sticks of white cheese wrapped with dough and fried until golden)and cakes.

Sara is a woman with fantastic business skills and currently she is applying for a "credikiva" loan. This is her first loan cycle that she requests from the Fundación Maria Santo Domingo. She will invest the loan in a new line of business, silver jewelry, which she plans to sell in the Guamo municipality where she has potential customers.

This investment will allow her to continue providing comfort to her family, since she is the mother of 3 young daughters. Her goal for the future is to have a general store and an ice-cream shop.

loans.use: to invest in a new business project selling silver jewelry.

loans.name: Ubaldo De Jesus

texts.es:
Ubaldo es un señor con 43 años de edad, presta el servicio de jardinería en el Municipio de bello, un actividad que aprendió de la mano de un amigo, quien se dedica a lo mismo.
Con esto ha tenido un gran progreso, tiene muy buenos ingresos y es un trabajador muy reconocido en dicho Municipio por excelente servicio, calidad y economía.

Actualmente tiene un problema, la maquina principal con la que labora, esta fallando por mantenimiento, esto ha hecho que Ubaldo pierda algunos de sus trabajos, es por esto que solicita un préstamo, el cual lo invertirá en el mantenimiento de la maquina industrial guadañadora.

Ubaldo tiene tres hijos con 4, 8 y 10 años de edad, su mayor deseo es poder pagar la educación de estos, pues su bienestar le preocupa.

Con su aporte este hombre podrá alcanzar sus sueños, anímese, preste hoy.
texts.en:
Ubaldo is a 43-year-old man.  He offers his services as a gardener in the municipality of Bello.  He learned this line of work from a friend who does it.  With this job he has made great progress.  He has a good income and is a very well-known worker in his town, due to his excellent service, quality work, and thriftiness.

He currently has a problem.  The machine that he mainly works with is failing because of its maintenance.  This has made Ubaldo lose some of his jobs.  Because of this, he is asking for a loan, which he will invest in the maintenance of his industrial mower.

Ubaldo has three children, ages 4, 8, and 10.  His biggest desire is to be able to pay for their education, because he is worried about their well-being.

With your support this man will be able to make his dreams come true.  Come on, lend today.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his industrial mower.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is a resident of Carles, Iloilo. She and her husband are engaged in the fishing business like most people in the community. They have been doing this for almost 16 years to earn a living.

Rosalie is a 39-year-old woman who dreams to have a better means of living. She wants to improve their livelihood for her children. She has four children to raised ages 16, 15, 11 and six years old. Thus, she is asking a loan for boat maintenance and to buy a new engine for their fishing boat to improve their catch

loans.use: for boat maintenance and to buy a new engine.

loans.name: Marjo

texts.en:
Marjo is 19 years old from Dingalan, Aurora. His family owns a sari sari store. And with four siblings, his parents cannot sustain all their needs especially his schooling.

That’s why Marjo wants to make a way by taking an education loan of PHP43,000, so he can support his schooling. He is taking up a 9-month Microfinance Technology course in ASKI Skills and Knowledge Institute. He is hopeful that lenders will approve his loan so he can graduate and find a stable job.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fees for a Microfinance Technology course.

loans.name: Merilyn

texts.en:
Merilyn operates a retail store selling jewelry in her community. She has been doing this for more than two years and earns well for the family. She and her husband live in the village with their children.

She successfully repaid her previous loan used for buying more jewelry to sell. Merilyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services. It helps to improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities.

Recently, Merilyn has requested a new loan to buy additional varieties of jewelry to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated by the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy more jewelry to sell.

location.town: San Jose, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Jocelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a tricycle pasenger business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from internet café. Jocelyn is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF in order to buy wheels and spare parts for her tricycle passenger business.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy wheels and spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.en: Evaristo is a very hard working man charged with the responsibility of taking care of 4 children and only one attends school in Hoima Uganda. He deals in buying and selling of maize, beans and rice, in turn he ventured in farming mostly cassava in order to supplement his incomes. He intends to grow and expand his business the more only to be limited by inadequate capital and high transport costs of his items to the produce store. He is seeking for credit to buy more maize and beans for sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize and beans for sell.

loans.name: Johsua

texts.en:
Johsua is 18 years old and is from Andal Alino, Talavera, Nueva Ecija. He is taking a 9-month Microfinance Technology course in ASKI.

He is eager to finish studying to find a stable job and give back to his parents and to the people who have been helping to send him to school. But before that, Johsua wants to access an education loan of PHP 23,000 from Kiva lenders to aid in his schooling.

loans.use: to pay for his school expenses.

loans.name: Mashhura

texts.ru: Эту самостоятельную и целеустремленную девушку зовут Машхура. Она 28 летняя жительница района Шахринав. Машхура живет вместе мужем и ребенком. Машхура любить шить и кроить, по этой причине она выбрала швейную деятельность. Уже 10 лет она продвигает свою любимую работу. Сидя дома она зарабатывает на жизнь. Машхура шустрая и активная девушка. Она шьет одну женскую одежду за 25 TJS. Машхура обратилась за кредитом, для купли швейные принадлежности. Она хочет расширить свой маленький бизнес. Машхура ждет Вашу доброту.
texts.en: This independent and motivated young woman is called Mashhura. She is a 28-year-old resident of the Shahrinav region. Mashhura lives with her husband and child. Mashhura loves to cut and sew, and so she chose the sewing business. She has been carrying on her beloved work for ten years now. She earns a living while sitting at home. Mashhura is a nimble and active young woman. She sews a piece of women's clothing for 25 TJS [Tajikistani Somoni]. Mashhura has applied for a loan to buy sewing supplies. She wants to expand her small business. Masshura awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a hardworking mother residing in the town of Carmen, Bohol. She earns a living by means of raising and selling pigs. She is married with three children. Her youngest child is 18. She is 45 years of age. Her husband's occupation is carpentry.

She would like to expand her livelihood by raising more pigs and having an abundant supply of food as well. She could be able to slowly manage her earnings and also provide for the needs of her family.

Vilma has requested a loan to buy pig feed and piglets, and to purchase materials for house repair. These resources are tools she will use in order to become sustainable and improve the family's living condition.

She is hoping that someday her livelihood will become productive and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and piglets, and to purchase materials for house repair.

loans.name: Nany

texts.en:
Nany is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Nany is 53 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Nany has a buy-and-sell drinks business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more boxes of drinks to sell.

Nany has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of drinks to sell.

loans.name: Zikrullo

texts.ru: Зикрулло 35 летный мужчина. Он в городе Турсунзаде живет  вместе женой и детьми. Его жена в школе работает учительницей. Зикрулло 10 лет своей жизни продвигает на скотном дворе, ухаживая за скотами. На сегодняшний день деятельность скотоводство является основным источником дохода в семью Зикрулло. У Зикрулло на скотном дворе есть крупнорогатый скот. И он старательно продвигается вперед, чтобы увеличить их поголовья. Иметь большое количество животных даст Зикрулло успешный бизнес в этой сфере и хорошее обеспеченное будущее. Для купли скотов, он просит кредит. Зикрулло надеется, что после финансирования дела пойдут отлично, и он может расширить свою деятельность.
texts.en: Zikrullo is a 35-year-old man. He lives in the city of Tursun-zoda with his wife and family. His wife works as a schoolteacher. Zikrullo has spent ten years of his life in a livestock yard, looking after cattle. Today rearing cattle is the main source of income for Zikrullo's family. Zikrullo has cattle in his livestock yard, and he diligently makes progress in order to increase his herd. Having a large number of animals will give Zikrullo a successful business in this field and a well provided-for future. He is asking for a loan to buy some cattle. Zikrullo hopes that after he gets financing things will go excellently and he will be able to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy some cattle.

loans.name: Zulayho

texts.ru: Сельское хозяйство является одним из самых трудных рабочих мест, потому что это занимает много тяжелой работы, чтобы двигаться вперед. Но Зулайхо никогда не отказалась, несмотря на плохую погоду или на то другое. Она всегда готова найти способ, чтобы обеспечить свою семью. Зулайхо прекрасная женщина. Ей 58 года. Она живет вместе семьей в районе Шахринав. Она встает с первыми лучами солнца отправиться в земельный участок, где она имеет обязательства работы. У нее есть собственный земельный участок, где она выращивает помидоры, огурцы и болгарский. Зулайхо хотелось обработать урожай и почву минеральными удобрениями, чтобы уничтожать микробы и насекомые. Для приобретения минеральных удобрений ей нужно Ваша поддержка. Она нуждается на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Agriculture is one of the most difficult occupations because it requires such laborious tasks in order to move forward. But Zulayho has never given up, despite bad weather or anything else. She is always prepared to find opportunities to provide for her family.

Zulayho is a wonderful woman. She is 58 years old, and she lives with her family in the Shahrinav region. She rises with the first light of the sun and heads to the plot of land where she grows tomatoes, cucumbers, and peppers.

Zulayho has wanted to cultivate her harvest and soil with mineral fertilizer, so that she can combat microbes and insects. In order to get mineral fertilizer, she needs your support. She relies on your support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Shoydullo

texts.ru: Житель Шахритузкого района Шойдулло родился в 1975 году . Имеет среднее образование. Женат имеет  семеро детей. Его дети все ученики средней школы.  В будущем он хотел бы дать всем им высшее образования. Шайдулло очень трудолюбивый человек. Он занимается купли продажи рогатого скота. Вот уже 10 лет как он занимается этой сферой деятельности. Этому делу он научился от своих родителей.   Продолжает деятельность своего отца. Сейчас ему нужно купить несколько голов скота.  А для этого нужна финансовая поддержка. Шойдулло за помощью обратился к Вам. Он верит в Вас!
texts.en:
Shoydullo, a resident of the Shahrituz region, was born in 1975. He has a secondary-level education. He is married, and has 7 children. His children are all students in secondary school. In the future, he would like to give them all good educations.

Shoydullo is a very hard-working man. He works by buying and selling cattle. He has been in this sphere of business for 10 years now, and he learned the business from his parents. He is continuing his father's business.

Now, Shoydullo needs to buy a few head of livestock. For this, he needs financial support. Shoydullo has applied to you for help. He believes in you!

loans.use: to purchase a few head of livestock.

loans.name: Yanet Del Pilar

texts.es:
Yanet es una señora con 35 años de edad, casada y tiene dos hijos menores de edad, trabajadora y humilde, debido a la situación económica tan poco favorable por la que está pasando, esta mujer toma la iniciativa de generar nuevos ingresos, su actividad favorita ha sido la gastronomía, piensa en montar su propio negocio, formalizarlo y llegar a generar empleo a las personas que más lo necesiten.
El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de alimentos al por  mayor y cubiertos.
Con su ayuda esta mujer podrá hacer de su sueño de ser una gran profesional en gastronomía y tener su propio negocio, anímese, preste hoy.
texts.en: Yanet is a 35 year old married woman who has two young children. She is hardworking and humble. Because of her not very favorable financial situation, this woman has taken the initiative to generate new income. Her favorite activity has been gastronomy. She plans to start her own business, to formalize it and be able to generate  employment for the people who need it the most. She will invest the loan to buy food items at wholesale prices and cutlery. With your help this woman will be able to reach her dream of being a great professional in gastronomy and have her own business. Get involved, lend today.

loans.use: to buy food items at wholesale prices and cutlery.

loans.name: Umedjon

texts.ru: Умедчон  житель Шахритузкого района.  Он очень спокойный и трудолюбивый человек. С ранних лет занимается  животноводством. Этой деятельности его научил отец.  Сейчас ему 25 лет, и  он пока что не женат.  Для дальнейшего процветания своего  бизнеса Умедчон обратился за кредитом.  На сумму кредита он хочет купить несколько голов скота и увеличить свой доход и накопить деньги на свадьбу. Умедчон верит и надеется на поддержку с Вашей стороны.
texts.en:
Umedjon lives in the Shahrituz region. He is a very easy-going and hard-working person. He has been raising livestock since he was young. His father taught him this business. Now Umedjon is 25 years old, and not yet married.

Umedjon has applied for a loan so that his business can flourish in the future. With the loan, he wants to buy a few head of livestock, increase his income, and save money for his wedding. Umedjon believes in and relies on your support.

loans.use: to purchase a few calves and grow his business.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Irshad is the age of 41 and a mother of four children, living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family.

Her husband is a driver, by profession. He provides transportation services using his auto rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for 15 years to meet the family’s expenses.

Currently, Irshad’s husband wants to repair his auto rickshaw to provide proper transportation services, but due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to repair the auto rickshaw.

Therefore, Irshad has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, Irshad’s husband can repair the auto rickshaw and provide the proper transportation services needed to earn an income.

She and her family will be thankful to the Kiva lenders and field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for helping them by funding this loan to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to repair her husband's auto rickshaw.

loans.name: Ramziya

texts.ru: Рамзия заботливая и добрая женщина. Ей 29 лет она замужем и имеет 4-х прекрасных детей. Проживает Рамзия вместе с семьей в  Вахшском районе. Рамзия занимается очень редкой для нашей страны работой – она водитель такси. Также в свободное от работы время она занимается животноводством. Несмотря на то, что она имеет не плохой доход дом, в котором они живут нуждается в срочном ремонте. Для этого ей необходимо дополнительная финансовая помощь. Она обратилась за кредитом для получения желаемой суммы и очень надеется, что ее запрос удовлетворят, и она сможет сделать дом более уютным для своей большой семьи.
texts.en:
Ramziya is a caring and kind woman. She is 29 years old, married, and has 4 wonderful children. Ramziya lives with her family in the Vakhsh region. Ramziya does a job that is very rare in her country - she drives a taxi. Also, when she is not working, she raises animals.

Although Ramziya's income isn't bad, the house where her family lives needs repairs badly.
For this, she requires additional financial assistance. She has applied for a loan for the amount she needs, and really hopes that her request will be fulfilled, and that she will be able to make her home more comfortable for her large family.

loans.use: to renovate her home.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Don Guadalupe de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, el se dedica a la venta de barriles de plastico desde hace 20 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y ya tiene clientes fijos que lo buscan por los buenos precios y la calidad del producto, co las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ganancias economicas.
texts.en:
Guadalupe, 60, lives in his own home with his wife and daughter. He has been selling plastic barrels for 20 years. He runs his business from his home and has a loyal customer base due to his competitive prices and quality.

He uses his income to pay for some of the household expenses.

He is asking for a loan to buy products wholesale so he can continue with his sales and improve his economic situation.

loans.use: to buy plastic barrels in bulk.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is a 44-year-old woman from the province of Iloilo, Philippines. She is married and has three school-aged children, ages 15, 6 and 3 years old.

To earn a living, Victoria and her husband are engaged in a fishing business. They have been doing this for seven years.

She is asking a loan for boat maintenance and to buy vegetables.

Perhaps she has been thinking of other additional income to enhance their livelihood. In the future, she wishes to improve their earnings for sustainability.

loans.use: to do boat maintenance and to buy vegetables.

loans.name: María Lilian

texts.es:
María, de 58 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está casada y tiene 4 hijos, de los cuales dos viven en E.E.U.U. y dos en el país, su esposo es mecánico y ella por el momento es ama de casa. 

María, antes se dedicaba a la costura de ropa para mujer, también tenía una tienda de productos básicos, pero actualmente solo se dedica a su hogar. 

El préstamo que está solicitando será utilizado para colocar una tienda y comprar productos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, pan, café, entre otros, porque ella desea mantenerse ocupada y aportar para los gastos del hogar.

María, desea obtener un nuevo crédito para hacer mejoras en su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is 58-year old. She went to school until 9th grade, is married and has four children, two of whom live in the US and two remain at home. Her husband is a mechanic, and at the moment Lilian is a housewife.

Lilian used to make clothes for women; she also used to run a shop selling basic groceries, but now she only looks after the house. The loan she is seeking will be used to start a store, and buy products like rice, beans, sugar, bread, coffee, among others, because she wishes to keep busy and help with household expenses. Lilian wishes to obtain a new loan to make improvements to her home.

loans.use: para colocar una tienda y comprar productos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, pan, café, entre otros

loans.name: Duglas Yovani

texts.es:
Duglas, de 38 años de edad, no estudio, está casado, vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, su esposa se dedica a las labores domésticas.

Duglas, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz y frijoles, esas actividades las realiza desde hace muchos años y todo lo aprendió de su padre; además de sus labores agrícolas también trabaja en una alcaldía municipal como fontanero.- Duglas tiene que recorrer una distancia de 200 metros para llegar hasta el lugar donde tiene sus cultivos.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, pago de jornales y preparación de terreno para dichos cultivos, con el cual espera tener una buena cosecha este año.
 
Duglas, desea que sus hijos aprendan muy bien las labores agrícolas, para que llegue a ser una persona muy trabajadora y honrada.
texts.en:
Duglas is 38 years old and studied up to Grade 9. He lives with his wife and four children. His wife does domestic work.

Duglas works growing basic grains like corn and beans. He has done this activity for many years and learned this from his father. Besides his agricultural work he works for the municipal government as a plumber. Duglas has to cover a distance of 200 meters to get to the place he has his crops.

The loan he is requesting is to buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer, manure and pay for labor and prepare the earth for his crops. Doing this he hopes to have a good harvest this year.

Duglas hopes that his children learn agricultural work well so they become responsible and honest people.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer, manure and pay for labor and prepare the earth for his crops.

loans.name: Husniya

texts.ru: Husniya is a resident of Yavan district. She is a very responsible woman, widow and a mother of four children. Husniya is an experienced seamstress. She has been involved in sewing since childhood. This activity is the most important to her. Everyone knows Husniya as the best dressmaker. Thus she provides for her children. Husniya applied for a loan in order to buy fabrics, threads and other necessary things for sewing. Husniya does not have enough money, because all her money she spent to feed her family. With the loan amount she wants to expand her business and improve her children`s life conditions. She is very needs your support.
texts.en:
Husniya is a resident of Yavan district. She is a very responsible woman, a widow and a mother of four children.

Husniya is an experienced seamstress. She has been involved in sewing since childhood. This activity is the most important to her. Everyone knows Husniya as the best dressmaker. This is how she provides for her children.

Husniya has applied for a loan in order to buy fabrics, threads and other necessary things for sewing. She does not have enough money to buy them because she spends all her money to feed her family. With the loan, she wants to expand her business and improve her children's living conditions. She very much needs your support.

loans.use: To buy fabrics, threads and other necessary things for sewing.

loans.name: Abdallah

texts.en:
Abdallah, age 50, a married father of four children, has been working as a warehouse supervisor for 22 years to provide his family with the necessary living needs.

He is his family's sole breadwinner since his wife doesn't work, and he has to make sure that his acquired income is enough to cover his family's necessary living needs.

Thus, and since his acquired monthly income is barely enough to cover his family's increasing living needs, Abdallah is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, which he will use in paying for his children increasing school tuition fees.

Abdallah is proud to have his picture taken with one of his children who will to benefit from the currently acquired loan.

He hopes to stay capable of paying for his children education until they graduate from university.

loans.use: To pay for his children increasing school tuition fees

loans.name: Ana Gladis

texts.es: Con 47 años de edad Ana vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos de 16 y 18 años de edad a los que han apoyado con sus estudios buscando la manera que puedan optar a mejor calidad de vida. Ana es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a prestar sus servicios en un merendero a la orilla de la playa en el cual realiza diversidad de cócteles de mariscos y platos de comida, por lo que gracias a ello logra llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ana desea construir una pared de su vivienda, ya que como se observa en la fotografía, la pared está hecha de pedazos de plástico y duralita, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un cuarto en su vivienda, la cual le permita proteger a su familia de la inseguridad.
texts.en:
At 47 years old, Ana lives in a home she owns, with her life partner and their two children, ages 16 and 18. She helps her children with their schooling, seeking a way for them to be able to choose a better quality of life.

Ana is a very hardworking woman who works providing her services in a beachside, outdoor restaurant, in which she makes various seafood cocktails and dishes. In this way she is able to meet her household expenses. Ana wants to build a room in her home, since, as seen in the photograph, the wall is made from pieces of plastic and roofing material. For this reason she seeks a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron in order to build a room in her house, that will provide security to her family.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to build a room in her house.

loans.name: Jing Group

texts.en:
Maria Jesica, age 45, a widowed mother of three children, is the featured borrower of the Jing group, which consists of two other Filipino members, Regemae and Cecile.

The three of them left their hometowns to come and work as housekeepers in Lebanon, hoping to meet the needs of their beloved families at home and offer them a better future.
Maria Jesica is pictured in the center with the pink top, with Regemae at the far right side of the picture with a black top, and Cecile on the left wearing a white top.

The three of them have decided to hold hands and together acquire a loan from Kiva field partner Al Majmoua. They have become best friends and have learned to trust each other ever since arriving to work in Lebanon. They all share the ambition of raising their families' standard of living back in the Philippines.

Maria Jesica is the mother of three children, and she works hard to support her children's basic needs and to offer them the best education she can, as her goal is to give them a brighter future. This is hard for Maria Jesica to do, since she has to be the caring mother and the hardworking father at the same time.

However, her current monthly income is barely enough to cover her own survival. For this reason, her acquired loan funds will be sent to her beloved children in the Philippines in order to pay for increasing school tuition fees.

loans.use: to pay for her three children's increasing school tuition fees back in her hometown in the Philippines.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Las Divinas Group

texts.es:
Actualmente la banca de emprendimiento es liderada por: Raquel es una mujer de 33 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 16 años. Y su negocio es la venta de comida.
Ella es buena madre, conversadora y muy feliz. Su negocio lo realiza en el barrio ‘plan 3000’ caracterizado por recibir a los sobrevivientes de la crecida del rio años atrás, la siguiente generación es productora manufacturera.
Raquel es de piel morena, usa lentes de aumento y lleva el cabello largo (sentada al centro, viste polera celeste y lleva cartera negra). Su lengua materna es el Guaraní y habla español. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja como chofer de bus y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela. Viven en una casa propia construida de madera que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. su negocio es la venta de comida como ‘majadito’ que es una comida en base a charque de res o de conejo, se lo acompaña con plátano y huevo frito, además de yuca, “cocino un plato diario porque la preparación demora mucho tiempo…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es las ventas son diarias, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de insumos de cocina por mayor como; aceite, yuca, carne y otros. Su sueño es tener un puesto de venta en el mercado, ella desea comprar insumos de cocina para cocina tradicional. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Raquel solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos de cocina para poder trabajar a diario.
texts.en:
Currently the entrepreneurship bank is headed up by Raquel. She is 33 years old and lives with her partner. She has 2 children, ages 10 and 16. Her business is the sale of food. She is a good mother, a conversationalist, and very happy. Her business is located in the "Plan 3000" neighborhood, an area known for receiving survivors from the growth of the river years ago. The second generation is in manufacturing production.

Raquel has brown skin. She wears glasses and has long hair. (In the photos she is seated in the center, dressed in a blue top, with a black purse.) Her first language is Guaraní, and she also speaks Spanish. She shares life with her partner who works as a bus driver, and her children who are in school. They live in a house they own, made of wood, that has all the basic services.

Her business is the sale of food, such as "majadito", a dish made of dried beef or rabbit, served with banana, a fried egg and yucca. "I make a daily dish because the preparation takes a good deal of time," she says. The advantage of her business is that she has daily sales. The disadvantage is the lack of capital to buy cooking supplies wholesale such as oil, yucca, meat, etc. Her dream is to have a stand in the market. She wants to purchase cooking supplies for traditional cooking. This is her second cycle of loans with the institution in the 5 years she has been developing this business. For these reasons Raquel seeks a loan to buy cooking supplies in order to be able to work every day.

loans.use: to buy cooking supplies in order to be able to work every day.

loans.name: Hasana

texts.en:
Hasana is a 47-year-old, Lebanese married woman living with her husband and only child. She doesn’t work and her husband is the main income source in the family. He owns an artisanal shop and has a good reputation in his town but he earns barely enough income.

Today, she is eager to take a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas. s.a.l., to pay her child's educational fees. She tends to provide him with a good education and ensure him with a secure future.

loans.use: to pay her child's educational fees.

loans.name: Las Capulinas Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Las capulinas es conformado por tres mujeres laboriosas coordinado por doña esperanza de 61 años de edad, soltera y madre de un hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de nacatamales, gaseosas y jugos hace seis años, solicita por tercer ciclo el financiamiento en la institución para la compra de maíz, carne, tocino, papa, vegetales y gaseosa, con el crédito anterior logro comprar una refrigeradora y mejorar sus ganancias y su nuevo proyecto es poner un puesto de fritanga. La segunda socia es Janeth  de 39 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado y la tercer socia es Jessenia de 50 años, propietaria de una pulpería.
texts.en: The “Las Capulinas” communal bank consists of three hard-working women. It is run by 61-year-old Esperanza. She is single and has a 21-year-old son. She has made a living for the past six years by selling nacatamales (maize, meat and rice wrapped in banana leaves), fizzy drinks and juice. She is on her third loan cycle with the institution and she will use the loan to buy maize, meat, bacon, potatoes, vegetables and fizzy drinks. With the previous loan, she managed to buy a refrigerator and improve her profits. Her new project is to set up a fried food stall. The other members are 39-year-old Janeth, who makes a living by selling clothes and shoes, and 50-year-old Jessenia, who owns a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy maize, meat, bacon, potatoes, vegetables and fizzy drinks

loans.name: Fabio De Jesús

texts.es: Fabio es un comerciante que reside en un barrio de Cartagena de Indias y cuando llegó oriundo de Medellín tuvo la expectativa de iniciar su propio negocio, así que colocó una tienda de víveres, sin embargo no tuvo éxito en esta actividad por un robo al que fue sometido.   Después de esta triste experiencia no se dio por vencido y se inició en el comercio de artículos misceláneos en el que lleva siete años con muy buenos resultados.  Todos los días de la semana los residentes del sector tienen la oportunidad de realizar sus compras a partir de las 6 a.m. hasta las 8 p.m. y con la finalidad de innovar el surtido del almacén está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo que invertirá en prendas de vestir, accesorios para dama y calzado.  Con esta inversión su inventario estará dispuesto para la temporada de amor y amistad, una festividad en la que su almacén vende por encima del promedio y en la que debe estar preparado. Luis es padre de un hijo y vive con su cónyuge a quienes les ha brindado bienestar con el fruto de su trabajo.  Su meta a futuro es continuar creciendo en su almacén.
texts.en: Fabio is a merchant who lives in a Cartagena de Indias neighborhood. When he arrived here from his native Medellin, he hoped to start his own business, so he started a grocery store. However, he was not successful, because he was robbed. After this sad experience, he did not give up and started selling diverse items, a business he has had for seven years with very good results. Every day of the week, the residents of this area have the chance to do their shopping from 6 a.m. until 8 p.m. With the purpose of innovating his store's stock, he is applying to a Credikiva, the first loan he is taking from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will invest it in clothing items, women accessories and footwear. With this investment, his inventory will be ready for the season of love and friendship, a holiday when his store sells above average and for which he has to be prepared. Luis has a son and lives with his wife. He has been able to give them both comfort with the fruit of his work. His goal in the future is to continue growing with his store.

loans.use: to buy clothing items, women accessories and footwear.

loans.name: José Moisés

texts.es:
Moisés, de 65 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, debido a su situación económica de sus padres no pudo continua estudiando, está casado y su esposa se encarga de los oficios de la casa, tienen 2 hijos pero todos viven aparte con sus familias.

Moisés, es agricultor desde hace 15 años, aprendió este trabajo gracias a su padre con quien iba a trabajar al campo,  también trabaja de carpintero en su casa porque tiene un pequeño taller, antes solo se dedicaba a los cultivos; su trabajo esta en su casa y su horario es desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta que termina la jornada del día.

Moisés, necesita el préstamo para comprar materiales para construir muebles de madera, esta ayuda mejorará su condición económica.

Sus sueños son comprar una vaca para tener vender la leche y también espera que su taller de carpintería pueda ser más rentable ahora que tendrá más material para trabajar.
texts.en:
Moisés, 65 years old, studied through the third grade. Due to his parents' financial situation, he wasn't able to continue his education. He is married, and his wife takes charge of the housekeeping. They have 3 children, but they all live separately with their families.

Moisés has been a farmer since he was 15 years old. He learned this work thanks to his father, with whom he used to work in the fields. He also works from home as a carpenter, because he has a small workshop. Before he used to only tend to his crops. His work is at home, and his day is from 6:00 a.m. until the workday ends.

Moisés needs the loan to buy materials to build wood furniture. This assistance will improve his financial situation.

His dreams are to buy a cow to be able to sell the milk. He also hopes that his carpenter's workshop can be more profitable, now that he will have more material to work with.

loans.use: to buy materials to build wood furniture.

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en:
Sumaira is the age of 30 and a mother of three children living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan.

Her husband is responsible to fulfil the needs of the entire family. He owns a general store. He has been running the general store for years, to meet the family’s expenses.He sells rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap, biscuits, etc. His general store is very famous in the colony, and that is the reason his business runs well. Due to good relations, his sales have increased a lot.

Now a days Sumaira’s husband wants to improve his general store for proper income, but due to insufficient financial means he is unable to purchase more items.

Therefore Sumaira has applied for a KIVA loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, Sumaira’s husband can purchase more items to earn a proper income.

Sumaira and her family will be thankful to KIVA, lenders, and field partner BRAC Pakistan for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to purchase more items for her husband's general store.

loans.name: Musart

texts.en:
Musarat is the age of 29 years old and a mother of four children living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan.

Her husband is responsible to fulfil the needs of the entire family. Her husband is a driver by profession. He provides transportation services using his loading rickshaw. He started driving a rickshaw four years ago to meet the family’s expenses.

Now a days Musarat’s husband wants to repair the loading rickshaw for proper transportation services, but due to insufficient financial means her husband is unable to repair the loading rickshaw.

Therefore Musarat has applied for a KIVA loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, Musarat’s husband can repair the loading rickshaw and provides the proper transportation services to earn an income.

Musarat and her family will be thankful to KIVA, lenders, and field partner BRAC Pakistan for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to repair the loading rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es:
Ana Patricia de 34 años de edad, Ella es originaria del municipio de Tecpan Guatemala, bajo su responsabilidad están sus dos hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a confeccionar uniformes escolares y  bordados a mano.
El crédito que ella recibió lo invirtió en compra de materiales como telas, sipers, botones, hilos y otros, que ella necesita para poder realizar su trabajo.
Gracias al apoyo de su esposo ella sigue adelante con su negocio ya que entre los dos se están ayudando para salir adelante.
El sueño de ella es ampliar mas su negocio surtirlo con mas variedad de productos asi obtendrá mejores ganancias para mandar a sus hijos a estudiar, ella esta solicitando este crédito para la compra de telas y accesorio para confeccionar prendas de vestir.
texts.en:
Ana Patricia, 34 years old, was born in the city of Tecpan, Guatemala. Her two young children depend on her, She earns her living selling school uniforms and clothing embroidered by hand.

She will use her loan to buy materials such as fabric, zippers, buttons, and thread which she needs to complete her work. Thanks to her husband's help she's getting ahead in business, since the two of them help each other to make progress.

Ana Patricia's dream is to increase her business, stock a larger variety of products so as to earn more profits and send her children to school. She is asking for this loan to buy fabrics and accessories for making clothing.

loans.use: to buy fabric and accessories to make clothing she can sell.

loans.name: Kassandra

texts.en: Kassandra is a 19 year old single woman living with her parents and one sibling. She doesn’t work, she is only focusing on her study and her father represents the main source of income for the family. Due to the hard financial situation, she is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay her study fees and to buy her books. Her purpose is to achieve high educational levels to be competitive with others and being able to help her father financially.

loans.use: to pay her study fees and to buy her books

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal KANCHARISUN, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Humbreto tiene 38 años de edad tiene 1 hijo y es soltero,el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose  a ejercer el servicio de taxi, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, el socio  es una persona responsable, a la vez el socio trabaja en una empresa privada, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
El socio solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the community bank KANCHARISUN, the bank is located in the district of Cusco and Cusco department. Humbreto is 38 years old and has 1 son and he is single, the partner alternates his daily activities with exercising the taxi service, the partner takes good time with his work which is doing well thanks to the effort he puts it each day to work, the partner is a responsible person, at the same time the partner works in a private company, the partner wants to continue working in this way to continue to support his family.
The partner is grateful for the credit granted and agrees to comply with their quotas. The partner is requesting a loan for maintenance of his car.

loans.use: pay for car maintenance.

loans.name: Anelen

texts.en:
Anelen was so encouraged that she was previously granted a loan, which certainly helped sustain her store and thus helped cover her family's daily needs.

She is again humbly asking for a 15,000 PHP loan to buy more quantities of grocery items, like rice, coffee, soda and rice noodles, which she sells at retail. It is important for her store to offer more food items to attract more customers. Her store means a lot to her since it has been her source of income for the past five years and has allowed her to meet her family's basic needs. Although there are times she encounters difficulty collecting her receivables, she puts her trust in the Lord to send her good customers.

Anelen's simple dream is that her store will grow and that God will always keep her family healthy. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies.

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for groceries, beverages and toiletries to sell.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 46 years old, with four children. Alicia works very hard to provide for them.

Alicia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like junk foods, eggs, home product care, and other groceries.

Alicia has been in this business for 1 year and sells a variety of items. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Alicia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like junk foods, eggs, home product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 63 years old and widowed with two children. Myrna works very hard to provide for them.

Myrna runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, sugar, bread, eggs, snacks food and other personal care products .

Myrna has been in this business for 10 years. 

In the future Myrna would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, sugar, bread, eggs, snacks food and other personal care products

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
This is 42-year-old Mohamed. He is married and has 4 children who are 20, 13, 7 and 2 years old.

In 2005, Mohamed established his pharmacy business. He began his business to help take good care of his children and develop himself. His business is located in the outskirts of the city, and his customers are made up of both men and women. Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, Mohamed earns about 1,900,000 SLL every month from his business.

Mohamed would like to take a loan in the amount of 5,000,0000 SLL. He requires a loan in order to buy inventory of different types of drugs to resell. He hopes that this loan will help him save and increase his profit margin.

In the future, Mohamed plans to complete his building project to reduce the huge amount paid for shop and house rent. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: buy inventory of different types of drugs to resell.

loans.name: Wendy Katerine

texts.es: Para Wendy de 21 años aperturar una tienda es un proyecto laboral que cuando es bien llevada y manejada con la rigurosidad del orden en las finanzas, la innovación, en marcar la diferencia con relación a las demás tiendas del sector, es una oportunidad de demostrar de sacar ese ímpetu empresarial que heredó de sus padres quienes la impulsaron para iniciar su negocio de tienda en el que ofrece a los habitantes de su barrio legumbres, aceites, grutas, verduras, carnes, lácteos y víveres en general; ella trabaja diariamente en el horario de 7:00 a.m. a 10:00 p.m., pero sin importar los largos horarios tiene clara su meta de fortalecer su negocio para lo cual está tramitando su primer credikiva con  la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo recursos que planea invertir en incrementar y diversificar su inventario de víveres con el fin de aumentar sus ventas y por lo tanto sus utilidades. Su sueño es conformar una familia, tener hijos y comprar su vivienda propia.
texts.en: For Wendy, who is 21 years old, to operate a store is a laborious task, that when well run, and managed with discipline and organization in its finance and innovation - making the difference in comparison to other stores in the sector - is a chance to prove and build upon the business impetus she inherited from her parents.  It was her parents who prompted her to start her business, which offers the people of her neighborhood beans, oils, fruits, vegetables, meats, dairy and other food in general.  She works daily from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm.  But regardless of the long hours, she has a clear goal: to strengthen her business.  This is why she is requesting her first Kiva loan with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation.  She plans to invest her resources to increase and diversify her inventory of supplies in order to increase her sales and therefore her profits.  Her dream is to start a family, to have children and become a homeowner.

loans.use: to invest in increasing and diversifying her inventory of supplies.

loans.name: Erkingul

texts.ru: Эркингуль, 41 год, замужем, есть сын и две дочери. У Эркингуль- средне-специальное образование, она работает бухгалтером в территориальной больнице. Дополнительно 14 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Эркингуль очень любит свою деятельность, на земельной доле 1,80 ГА она выращивает ячмень. Также в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 10 овец. Накопления Эркингуль старается вкладывать в образование и воспитание детей, а также в развитие бизнеса. Эркингуль обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сомов (KGS) на покупку 4 бычков для откорма и реализации. Благодаря кредиту, Эркингуль сможет откладывать доходы от бизнеса на дальнейшее его развитие, что позволит накопить на образование ее детей.
texts.en: Erkingul is 41 years old, married, and she has one son and two daughters.  She has a specialized secondary education and she works as an accountant in a local hospital.  For the past 14 years, she has also been involved in agriculture and animal husbandry.  She grows barley on 1.8 hectares of land, and she has three cows and ten sheep on her farm.  Erkingul loves her work.  She is trying to save some money to raise and educate her children, and also to grow her business.  She has turned to Kiva's partner, Bai Tushum, and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy four steers for fattening and resale.  Thanks to her loan, she will be able to invest the earnings from her activity into further growing her business, which will in turn help her to save some money to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy four steers for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Nasiran

texts.en:
Nasiran is 35 and a mother of one child. She lives with her spouse and child in the area of Multan, Pakistan. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family. He is a driver by profession. He provides transportation services using his auto rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw 15 years to meet the family’s expenses.

Now Nasiran’s husband wants to buy a new auto rickshaw to provide proper transportation services, but due to insufficient financial means he is unable to. Therefore Nasiran has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, Nasiran’s husband can purchase the auto rickshaw and provide the proper transportation services to earn an income.

She and her family will be thankful to the Kiva lenders and field partner BRAC Pakistan for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standard.

loans.use: to buy an auto rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Shenaz

texts.en:
Shenaz is the age of 25 years old and a mother of 6 children living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan. Her husband is a driver by profession. He provides transportation services using his loading rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw 4 years to meet the family’s expenses.

Now Shenaz’s husband wants to repair his loading rickshaw for proper transportation services but due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to repair the loading rickshaw.

Therefore Shenaz has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, Shenaz’s husband can repair the loading rickshaw and provides the proper transportation services to earn an income.
Shenaz and her family will be thankful to the Kiva lenders and field partner BRAC Pakistan for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standard.

loans.use: to repair a loading rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Aurea

texts.en:
Aurea is 60 years old from Sto. Domingo, Nueva Ecija. She wants to send her granddaughter, Lady Ann to school. But because she is not financially stable, she wants to seek help from the Kiva lenders.

She wants to take an education loan of PHP33,000 to sustain the schooling of her granddaughter. Lady Ann is taking up a 6-month Bookkeeping course in ASKI Skills and Knowledge Institute.

loans.use: to pay for her granddaughter's tuition fee in Bookkeeping.

loans.name: Paola Inés

texts.es: Paola de 26 años habita en un barrio de Cartagena de Indias un municipio del departamento de Bolívar y como tan solo era ama de casa realmente necesitaba generar ingresos para ayudar con el sostenimiento del hogar, así que con el apoyo de su cónyuge encontró la manera de crecer comercialmente con un capital que invirtió en la compra de lavadoras para dar en alquiler a sus vecinos y residentes del sector que no poseen en sus viviendas estos electrodomésticos que le permitan realizar esta labor con menos esfuerzo. Todos los días a partir de las  6 a.m. hasta las 6 p.m. esta dispuesta a atender a su clientela y en la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, comprará dos lavadoras. Esta inversión le permitirá incrementar sus servicios y con ello sus ingresos. Paola es madre de dos hijos a quienes les aporta bienestar, su meta tener otros negocios y tener su propio local.  Su meta terminar de construir su vivienda que actualmente está en obra gris y continuar apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios.
texts.en: Paola is 26 years old and lives in a Cartagena de Indias neighborhood, a municipality of the Department of Bolivar. Being only a housewife, she needed to generate income to support her household. With her husband's support, she found the way to grow commercially.  With some capital, she invested in buying laundry machines to rent to neighbors and residents of her area, who do not own these appliances that allow them to do this job with less effort. Every day from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m., she is ready to help her customers. Currently, she is requesting a Credikiva, the first loan she is taking from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will buy two laundry machines. This investment will allow her to increase her services, and with this her income. Paola is the mother of two children for whom she provides. Her goal is to have other businesses and also her own work place. Her goal is to finish building her house, because currently it is unfinished; and to keep on supporting her children with their education.

loans.use: to buy two laundry machines.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
For a year, Norma has run a sari-sari store. She sells basic household commodities like eggs, coffee, assorted canned goods, noodles, condiments, powdered soap and biscuits. She is 39 years old with four children. Her eldest is 12 and the youngest is 4. She hails from the town of Batuan, Bohol.

She is asking a loan in the amount of 4,000 PHP to buy assorted groceries such as seasonings, canned goods and toiletries. These will help maintain the the merchandise levels of her store and able to attract more buyers as well.
It contributes to improve her daily earnings and start to pay her obligations. Thus, she could afford to provide her family with nutritious meals and continue to send her children to school.

With proper handling of these resources, she is doing her best to become productive.

loans.use: to buy assorted groceries such as  seasonings, canned goods and toiletries

loans.name: Rahima

texts.ru: Рахима успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Рахимы имеется 4 коровы. На участке мерою 1,56 Га она выращивает огурцы и хлопок. По прежнему печет тандырные самсы для реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рахима вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка 2 телят для разведения и увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Рахима планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и свадьбу младшей дочери.
texts.en:
Rahima successfully repaid her loan, using it as intended. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped with her financing.

Rahima now has 4 cows on her farm. On a plot of land measuring 1.56 hectares, she grows cucumbers and cotton. Like she did previously, she bakes samosas in a tandoori oven for resale.

In order to further develop her business, Rahima has again applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS), with which she wants to buy 2 calves to increase her headcount of livestock. Rahima plans to invest the proceeds from her loan in the further development of her business and her youngest daughter's wedding.

loans.use: to purchase two calves in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard who is married with 4 children is a resident of Hoima Uganda.  He is charged with the responsibility of providing them with all the basic needs and all attend school. He is a very hard working tailor who works 12 hours a day. In order to supplement his incomes, he deals in keeping poultry. He intends to educate his children and he is seeking for a loan facility to buy more chicks for rearing.

loans.use: to buy more chicks for rearing.

loans.name: Khem's Group

texts.en:
A resident living in a rural area of Kandal province, Khem is 37-year-old and she is a married mother of three dependent children, one of whom is a school child. She grows rice to support her family’s living conditions for 17 years. Because of drought so her crop did not grow well.

For Khem, she has never been with VisionFund before and this is the first loan cycle for her. In a group of five members, she is the leader and she is going to use her portion of loan to buy fertilizer to increase productivity of her crop yield. She hopes to get a high yield so that she can sell it for good profit to upgrade her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to increase productivity of her crop, so that she can sell it for good profit and to upgrade her lifestyle.

loans.name: Zreena

texts.en:
Zreena is 40-years old woman. She lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of two sons and one daughter. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He has been running an auto rickshaw for the last six years. For the past many days, his rickshaw is not working properly because of regular use. He feels that most of its parts are out of order.

He is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to maintain the auto rickshaw. However due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of maintenance of his rickshaw. Therefore Zreena has requested for a loan from Kiva's field's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of a maintenance of rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Zreena is so much thankful to Kiva and fields partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to use this loan to repair the rickshaw for her husband's transportation services.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es: Dominga es una mujer llena de sueños y grandes objetivos en la vida, ella está muy contenta porque gracias al préstamo que obtuvo logro comprar el terreno que tanto había anhelado y próximamente construirá su casa, y eso la tiene muy entusiasmada, y agradece a los inversionistas de kiva quienes confiaron en sus sueños y en su persona. Dominga  con el deseo de mejorar su calidad de vida ha decidido aprovechar la oportunidad de comprar un terreno con cultivo de maxan, esto lo hace con el fin de contar con un lugar donde pueda cultivar y generar ingresos, pues aparte de su negocio de verduras también se dedica a la venta de ropa típica pero para construir su casa necesita mejorar sus ingresos.Su gran anhelo es darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dominga is a woman who has many dreams and great objectives in her life. She is happy because of the loan she received to buy the land she wanted so much, where she will soon build her house. Dominga is very excited about this and grateful to the Kiva investors who trusted in her dreams and in her.

To improve her quality of life, Dominga has decided to take advantage of the opportunity to buy a piece of land for growing maxan (maxan leaves are used to wrap tamales and other food). She is doing this in order to have a place to grow plants and generate income.

Besides her business selling vegetables Dominga also sells traditional clothing. However, in order to build a house, she needs to increase her income. Dominga's major goal is to provide a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to grow maxan.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Pura continúa con su negocio de venta de ropa de segunda mano sentada, viste de negro). el crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de ropa de segunda mano por mayor. El pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque tuvo buenas ventas. Actualmente su negocio continúa prosperando, su necesidad principal es renovar su mercadería porque está rota constantemente, “la buena ubicación de mí puesto de venta hace de mi negocio un éxito…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que se encuentra bien ubicado, la desventaja es la falta de capital para renovar la mercadería constantemente. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio, ella desea renovar su stock de ropa comprando ropa de segunda mano por mayor. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Pura solicita un préstamo para comprar ropa de segunda mano por mayor para ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Pura is continuing with her business selling secondhand clothing (in the photo, she is seated, dressed in black). The loan she received previously was for the purpose of buying used clothing in bulk. Pura made her payments on time because she had good sales.

Her business continues to do well. Pura's main need is to provide new merchandise because it's always being depleted through sales. "The good location of my place of sale makes my business a success," she comments. The business has a good location to its advantage; the disadvantage is lack of capital to always keep providing different merchandise.

Pura's dream is to make her business grow. She wants to renew her stock of clothing by buying used clothing in bulk. This is her second cycle of loans with the organization in the 10 years she has been carrying out this work. These are the reasons why Pura is asking for a loan to buy used clothing in bulk to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothing to increase her business.

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es:
Pascual con su amabilidad, respeto y carisma a sus clientes a logrado mantener pues su tienda de abarrotes es la más buscada por lo que él está muy contento con la inversión que realizo pues gracias a ello logro comprar más mercadería y a sus clientes pudo satisfacer mejor, él está muy agradecido con los inversionistas de kiva pues el apoyo que el recibió fue de gran beneficio para su familia y negocio. Pascual antes solo contaba con la tienda pero ahora ya cuenta con el servicio de molino de nixtamal en su tienda por lo que han incrementado aún más sus clientes, con esta demanda que Pascual tiene se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar más productos como; arroz, azúcar, gaseosas y golosinas para su tienda.
Su más grande anhelo es construir una casa de block para su familia y brindarles a sus hijos una mejor educación.
texts.en:
Pascual, with his friendliness, respect, and charm towards his clients has succeeded in maintaining his grocery store, which is the most sought after. Because of this, he is very happy with the loan he received, which he used to purchase more merchandise, thus better satisfying his customers. He truly appreciates the Kiva lenders.

The support he received was a great boon for his family and business. Before, Pascual only had his store, but now he also has the service of a nixtamal mill in his store, which has increased his clientele even more.

With Pascual's current request, he needs to ask for a new loan to purchase more products, like rice, sugar, soft drinks, and sweets for his store. His biggest dream is to build a cinder block house for his family and give his children a better education.

loans.use: purchase more grocery products, like rice, sugar, soft drinks, and sweets.
